transcription.speaker: Customer
transcription.text: Hi, I'm having trouble connecting to the office Wi-Fi.

transcription.speaker: Employee
transcription.text: Hi! I'd be happy to help. Can you tell me the network name you're trying to connect to?

transcription.speaker: Employee
transcription.text: Got it. Are you seeing any error messages?

transcription.speaker: Employee
transcription.text: Understood. Let's try resetting your Wi-Fi adapter. Can you go to your network settings and click 'Disable', then 'Enable'?

transcription.speaker: Employee
transcription.text: Great. Now try reconnecting to the 'OfficeNet' network.

transcription.speaker: Customer
transcription.text: It worked! Thank you so much!

transcription.speaker: Employee
transcription.text: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
